actions.recommendation: You have numerous moles. There is one on your back just above your bra strap that you say is itchy and you have scratched it. I recommend that you get it checked by a dermatologist.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
To reduce your risk of chronic disease it is recommended to maintain your BMI < 25 and waist to height ratio < 50%. Aim to lose some weight especially around your waist.
